entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Snow level 600 metres. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 08:25 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 700 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 08:25 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
